original_text: Some of the Jews there spoke against Apollos's message. But he argued strongly against them so that everyone could hear. He explained to them what God had said in the Bible. He showed them clearly that Jesus is God's Messiah.
korean_text: 이는 성경으로써 예수는 그리스도라고 증언하여 공중 앞에서 힘있게 유대인의 말을 이김이러라

sentences.original_text: Some of the Jews there spoke against Apollos's message.
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에 있던 어떤 유대인들이 아볼로의 메시지에 반대하여 말했습니다.

sentences.original_text: But he argued strongly against them

sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 들을 수 있도록 했습니다.
